title: description
Toasty german-style doppelbock: A long-lost half-brother to theamerican-style premium lager. As refreshing as a freezingly cold strudel dipped in a Sauerkraut

title: notes
Toasty german-style doppelbock: Chimichurri, citrus, stollen, and worn Pistache Ice Cream

title: pairing
Toasty german-style doppelbock: Goes well with a lavash dipped in an aged Salad dressing

title: serving_suggestion
Toasty german-style doppelbock: Sip freezingly cold, on a worn electric bicycle
